items.title: How to answer "Tell Me About Yourself" ?

visible_instructors.name: The Final
visible_instructors.job_title: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere
visible_instructors.title: The Final Academy

items.headline: The Complete Guide with Examples & Stories
objectives_summary: Interviewers decide whether to hire you or not during the first five minutes of the interview. Which is the first interview question? 'Tell me About Yourself'. So your interview success is completely dependent on your answer to this question.

Do you know what the hiring manager's evaluation criteria? They are interested to know about your education, experience, expertise, strength,work ethics and personal trait. Your answer should explain all these detail about you. You will learn how to use the unique EESWP framework for your winning answers.
We will evaluate few tragic examples so that you can avoid those type of answers during the interview

items.title: Self Selling: Your Way to the Job and Contract You Dream Of
items.headline: Sell. Present. Position. YOURSELF. Get the Job/ Contract You Deserve through the Validated System of Self Selling
objectives_summary: Need to find a job? Need to get new projects as a freelancer? Need to have more clients for you company? You will find here the mental positioning, techniques, practical tips and directions to sale your products and services. Keep in mind that we first sell ourselves and then our potential customers decide if they want/ like our products or services. Get ready to create the right environment, the productive relationships that help you succeed in your professional life: as an employee, freelancer, or company owner.
